column4: hey guys, when i run the XSane Image scanner is doesnt detect my scanner, can anyone help?
my Scanner is a Canon "CanoScan LiDE 90"
can anyone help me get my CanoScan LiDE 90 Scanner working?
install libsane-extras
you could get lucky and have your scanner supported there
is that in the repositories?
i have a lide 35 and it's supported .. have no idea if the 90 model is also
yes .. just apt-get install libsane-extras
ist not a program right? so to test if that works i just run Xsane right?
do i restart comp after? i installed it and it didnt work
no need to restart ..
gimme a sec
you're out of luck
http://www.sane-project.org/unsupported/canon-lide-90.html
i installed the 1.0.19-23ubuntu7 verison
mine is the only scanner on the list? wow how lucky is that
hardly the only
http://www.sane-project.org/unsupported/
when i bought mine i did some research first just to be sure
so theres nothing i can do? :(
you could enroll the sane devel team and write the driver =)
i would if i could :P
